aka: Mucha: The Story of an Artist Who Created a Style
慕夏狂潮：从崛起到永恒
this_title: Alfons Mucha: L'affichiste de l'art nouveau
trans_title: 穆夏：新艺术招贴画大师
Mucha: The Story of an Artist Who Created a Style
慕夏狂潮：从崛起到永恒
introduction: Czech painter and illustrator Alphonse Mucha (1860-1939) ranks among the pioneers of the Art Nouveau movement at the end of the 19th century. Virtually overnight, he becomes famous in Paris thanks to the posters that he designs to announce actress Sarah Bernhardt’s plays. But at the height of his fame, Mucha decides to leave Paris to realize his lifetime project.
chinese_title: 穆夏：新艺术招贴画大师
foreign_title: Alfons Mucha: L'affichiste de l'art nouveau
